trans-unit.source: Contains information about an area of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control or a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene informazioni relative a un'area del controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> o dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> quando viene chiamato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView.HitTest%2A> metodo viene chiamato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> class.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo> classe.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control named `treeView1`, and populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> with items.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un Windows Form che contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> controllo denominato `treeView1`e di popolare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> con gli elementi.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that `treeview1` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for the form are associated with the `HandleMouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Verificare che `treeview1` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento per il form sono associati i `HandleMouseDown` (metodo).

trans-unit.source: The tree node located at the position indicated by the hit test.
trans-unit.target: Nodo della struttura ad albero nella posizione indicata dall'hit test.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo" />.

trans-unit.source: The `hitNode` parameter can be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Il `hitNode` parametro può essere `null`.

trans-unit.source: Gets the location of a hit test on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control, in relation to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> and the nodes it contains.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene la posizione di un hit test in un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> rispetto all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> e ai nodi in esso contenuti.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestLocations" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Location%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste the following code into a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> control named `treeView1`, and populate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> with items.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un Windows Form che contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> controllo denominato `treeView1`e di popolare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> con gli elementi.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that `treeview1` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event for the form are associated with the `HandleMouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Verificare che `treeview1` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento per il form sono associati i `HandleMouseDown` (metodo).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> at the position indicated by a hit test of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> nella posizione indicata da un hit test di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> at the position indicated by a hit test of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode" /> nella posizione indicata da un hit test di un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView" />.

trans-unit.source: If the hit test location is not on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> property will be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se il percorso dell'hit test non si trova in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeNode>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> proprietà sarà `null`.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeViewHitTestInfo.Node%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, create a Windows Form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> named `treeView1`, and populate it with several levels of nodes.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire questo esempio, creare un Windows Form che contiene un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView> denominato `treeView1`e popolarlo con diversi livelli di nodi.

trans-unit.source: Paste the following code into a form, and associate the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event of `treeView1` with the `treeView1_MouseDown` method.
trans-unit.target: Incollare il codice seguente in un form e associare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> evento di `treeView1` con il `treeView1_MouseDown` metodo.
